Test: public void testSimpleWrites() throws IOException { TokenBuffer buf = new TokenBuffer(null, false); JsonParser jp = buf.asParser(); jp.close(); buf.writeString("abc"); jp = buf.asParser(); jp.close(); buf.writeNumber(13); jp = buf.asParser(); jp.close(); buf.close(); }
Code: public void writeNumber(short i) throws IOException { _appendValue(JsonToken.VALUE_NUMBER_INT, Short.valueOf(i)); }
